translation:

"we should protect our personal data like our parents protected us from dangerous content on the internet. #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post highlights the importance of protecting personal information in the digital age, drawing a parallel between the protection of children from harmful online content and the need for individuals to safeguard their personal data. by using the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsph채re (privacy), the post also connects to ongoing conversations around these topics on social media platforms.
